title: Crypto Liquidations Cross $550M as Bitcoin Remains Volatile Ahead of Historic Highs
description: Memecoin futures took on nearly $90 million in liquidations as prices corrected after a massive rally in the past week.

title: Bitcoin Miner Bitdeer Says It Has Launched Its ‘First Cryptocurrency Mining Chip’
description: Bitdeer, a bitcoin miner, recently announced the launch of what it refers to as its “first cryptocurrency mining chip.” Bitdeer claimed that the chip could potentially improve bitcoin mining performance without excessive power consumption. title: Solana adds 35% in one week, GFOX presale nearly sold out

title: Kremlin hopes to cut US dollar reliance with blockchain in BRICS
description: Moscow wants to establish an autonomous BRICS payment system, leveraging digital currencies and blockchain in an effort to decrease its dependency on the U.S. dollar. In an interview with the Russian state-owned news agency TASS on Feb. 5, Kremlin aide…

title: Fetch.ai and Injective soar; NuggetRush presale drawing investors

title: SEC postpones decision on BlackRock and Fidelity’s Ethereum spot ETF

title: Shiba Inu enters top 10 cryptos, whale activity skyrockets

title: Ark Invest sells $31m in Coinbase, buys Meta amid Bitcoin rally
description: Ark Invest, led by Cathie Wood, has sold nearly $31 million worth of Coinbase shares as Bitcoin approached a new all-time high, nearly reaching the $69,000 mark on March 4. The investment manager executed the sale of 134,749 Coinbase shares…

title: BTC Price Surge Fueled by Qatar’s Reported Bitcoin Reserves Addition, Ex-White House Director Suggests
description: El Salvador has managed to improve the wealth status of all its citizens through the adoption of Bitcoin, thus informing other countries led by Qatar to follow suit.
